rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
“直到问题得到解决”：国会加大对社会保障追回的行动力度参议院财政委员会正在加强对社会保障超额支付问题的监督，并计划每月与该机构会面，“直到问题得到解决”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/e28098Until-it-is-fixede28099-Congress-ramps-up-action-on-Social-Security-clawbacks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/e28098Until-it-is-fixede28099-Congress-ramps-up-action-on-Social-Security-clawbacks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=afc0fe65-742e-4183-a53b-af2005e0ba35 Fri, 15 Dec 2023 07:14:08 -0500 ‘Until it is fixed’: Congress ramps up action on Social Security clawbacks
学校假期是澳大利亚儿童体重过度增加的黄金时间距离暑假只有几周了，澳大利亚的孩子们期待着一些应得的假期。但过多的休息时间可能会造成健康问题，因为新的研究表明，假期是孩子体重过度增加的黄金时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/School-holidays-are-the-prime-time-for-excessive-weight-gain-in-Australian-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/School-holidays-are-the-prime-time-for-excessive-weight-gain-in-Australian-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce7a6b32-c51e-4902-ab4e-fc0cba24e819 Fri, 15 Dec 2023 02:37:00 -0500 School holidays are the prime time for excessive weight gain in Australian children
经常锻炼身体的女性在绝经前患乳腺癌的可能性较小根据乳腺癌现在资助的新研究，定期的休闲时间体育活动可能会降低绝经前女性患乳腺癌的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/Physically-active-women-less-likely-to-develop-breast-cancer-before-menopause.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/Physically-active-women-less-likely-to-develop-breast-cancer-before-menopause.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=994036fb-92e8-4b41-ad72-fa5ed42f97aa Fri, 15 Dec 2023 02:35:00 -0500 Physically active women less likely to develop breast cancer before menopause
昆士兰科技大学的科学家发现了治疗致命子宫内膜癌的有希望的治疗方法昆士兰科技大学的科学家们发现了一种有希望的新疗法，用于治疗一种致命的子宫内膜癌，如果癌症在初始治疗后扩散或复发，预后就会很差，这种困境影响着 15-20% 的子宫内膜癌患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/QUT-scientists-discover-promising-treatment-for-fatal-endometrial-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/QUT-scientists-discover-promising-treatment-for-fatal-endometrial-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53bd52a4-4cb8-41a8-a9f8-8b4a65536363 Fri, 15 Dec 2023 02:19:00 -0500 QUT scientists discover promising treatment for fatal endometrial cancer
轻度体力活动可以成为对抗儿童肥胖的有力工具一项新的后续研究表明，从童年到成年早期久坐时间的增加会导致身体脂肪和腹部脂肪增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/Light-physical-activity-can-be-a-powerful-tool-for-combating-childhood-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/Light-physical-activity-can-be-a-powerful-tool-for-combating-childhood-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8726795-8168-43b4-b283-8054cfe7843a Fri, 15 Dec 2023 02:14:00 -0500 Light physical activity can be a powerful tool for combating childhood obesity
Blueprint Medicines 宣布 AYVAKYT 获批用于治疗欧洲 ISM 患者Blueprint Medicines Corporation 今天宣布，欧盟委员会已批准 AYVAKYT®（avapritinib）用于治疗对症治疗未充分控制中度至重度症状的惰性系统性肥大细胞增多症（ISM）成年患者。 AYVAKYT 是欧洲第一个也是唯一一个被批准用于 ISM 患者的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/Blueprint-Medicines-announces-approval-of-AYVAKYT-for-treatment-of-ISM-病人-in-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/Blueprint-Medicines-announces-approval-of-AYVAKYT-for-treatment-of-ISM-病人-in-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=059c0ff6-b052-4165-ac91-926648f8c17c Fri, 15 Dec 2023 02:05:00 -0500 Blueprint Medicines announces approval of AYVAKYT for treatment of ISM patients in Europe
西梅对绝经后女性的炎症和骨质流失具有强大的功效《营养杂志》上发表的一项新研究表明，每天食用李子可以减少与骨信号通路相关的炎症标志物，并减少绝经后女性骨质流失的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/Prunes-pack-a-powerful-punch-against-inflammation-and-bone-loss-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/Prunes-pack-a-powerful-punch-against-inflammation-and-bone-loss-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0cb18bda-6ecc-425f-bfdf-3fc684730c3e Fri, 15 Dec 2023 02:02:00 -0500 Prunes pack a powerful punch against inflammation and bone loss in postmenopausal women
新型干粉气雾剂 COVID-19 疫苗有望对抗多种病毒株研究介绍了一种新型干粉气雾剂 COVID-19 疫苗，显示其可有效诱导强烈的免疫反应并提供针对各种 SARS-CoV-2 毒株（包括 Omicron）的保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/New-dry-powder-aerosol-COVID-19-vaccine-shows-promise-against-multiple-virus-strains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/New-dry-powder-aerosol-COVID-19-vaccine-shows-promise-against-multiple-virus-strains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f27b50a2-d886-426e-a8ca-02bfad4704d1 Fri, 15 Dec 2023 00:49:00 -0500 New dry powder aerosol COVID-19 vaccine shows promise against multiple virus strains
鼻内 COVID-19 疫苗有望减轻严重症状研究评估了单剂量鼻内喷雾疫苗 dNS1-RBD，发现它对有症状的 COVID-19 有效，特别是在减少严重症状和呼吸道问题方面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/Intranasal-COVID-19-vaccine-shows-promise-in-reducing-severe-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/Intranasal-COVID-19-vaccine-shows-promise-in-reducing-severe-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd7beda9-8a09-4c42-bded-2ce244b0a59e Fri, 15 Dec 2023 00:07:00 -0500 Intranasal COVID-19 vaccine shows promise in reducing severe symptoms
伦敦大学学院的研究人员开发出新的基因疗法来治疗严重的儿童癫痫伦敦大学学院的研究人员开发了一种新的基因疗法来治疗破坏性的儿童癫痫症，一项新的研究表明，这种疗法可以显着减少小鼠的癫痫发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/UCL-researchers-develop-new-gene-therapy-to-cure-severe-childhood-epilepsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/UCL-researchers-develop-new-gene-therapy-to-cure-severe-childhood-epilepsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f66df7f9-0c97-4e98-97f1-d2c5543d36c8 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 23:55:33 -0500 UCL researchers develop new gene therapy to cure severe childhood epilepsy
